Reviews.Title: Looks real. Great value
Reviews.Author: Harold From Houston
Reviews.Content: This camera is great value. Looks like the real thing. Very easy to install. I highly recommend this camera for "bluff" security.

Reviews.Title: Good for what you pay
Reviews.Author: Tool Guy
Reviews.Content: The LED light is very bright and actually makes it look very fake.  But the lens and dome look very real without the light.  So you can save money and skip the batteries.Installation was easy.  They come with a useful template for screw placement.Have some extra screws handy though.  I installed 6 of these and 2 packages had a defective screw.  #6 Pan heads work fine.

ProductInfo.Features:
Monoprice's white dummy dome camera is a great all around solution for offices retail and loss prevention
With a sleek design these cameras will blend in nicely with your existing cameras
The switchable on/off LED can be turned on to create a different look but you decide if you want it on or off
ProductInfo.Name: Monoprice 108429 Dummy Dome Camera with Switchable On/Off LED
